类 Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • Register

  • public class Register
extends java.lang.Object
    class: connect to register database.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.lang.String DBNAME
      constant: database name.
      private static java.lang.String DBPASSWORD
      constant: database password.
      private static java.lang.String DBUSER
      constant: database user.
      private static int ONE
      constant: one for 1.
      private static int THREE
      constant: three for 3.
      private static int TWO
      constant: two for 2.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Register() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      net.sf.json.JSONObject appendUser(net.sf.json.JSONObject data)
      function: append the user data to the database.
      net.sf.json.JSONObject checkUser(net.sf.json.JSONObject data)
      function: check the user data is valid or not.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
